Services

    Small Animals

    Surgery, dental, neutering, vaccination, microchipping, and more

    Large Animals

    Consultations, on-farm visits, TB testing, and more

    Equine

    Pre-purchase vetting, ultrasounds, x-rays, blood tests, reproduction services, and more

    Equine Services

    We offer a plethora of services delivered by our expert staff

    Call-outs & 24hr emergency service

    We provide 24hr emergency service for all registered equine clients.

    Vetting/pre-purchase examinations

    We offer thorough vetting and pre-purchase examinations, ensuring sound health and suitability. Trust our experienced veterinarians to provide detailed assessments and peace of mind before you buy.

    Ultrasound scanning

    We provide advanced ultrasound scanning for equine pregnancy checks and fertility management. With precise imaging, we monitor foetal development, detect early pregnancies, and assess reproductive health.

    Castration

    We offer castration services for all registered equine clients.

    Bloodwork

    Our clinic offers in-house biochemistry and haematology bloodwork. These advanced tests allow us to assess your animal’s organ function, detect infections, and monitor overall health, allowing us to provide immediate and effective care with the latest diagnostic technology. We also send bloodwork away to external laboratories when necessary.

    Lameness Examinations

    We offer comprehensive lameness examinations to identify and treat the root causes of your horse’s discomfort. With advanced diagnostics and expert care, we aim to return your horse to peal performance.

    Microchipping, Marking & Travel Documentation

    We offer comprehensive services for ponies and foals, including marking, microchipping, and completion of travel documentation. Ensure your pony’s safety & compliance with legal requirements, through our expert care.

    FEC (external lab)

    We use an external lab for all faecal egg counts for accurate results. Ensure effective parasite management with our reliable testing services.

    Routine work (vaccinations & parasite control)

    Our clinic provides routine visits, offering essential services such as vaccination and parasite control.
